name: Crab in a Shell
description:
A crab is falling from the sky. It is on its way back into the water and therefore needs your guidance. Colliding with objects in the air will cause serious harms and might be the end of crab's journey. 

Make it into the water and unlock crabs friends. There are six of them plus four difficulty levels waiting for you. The game is also perfectly fine for young players.

Play with arrow keys.

This is our first game. We did a prototype during our game jam weekend in February 2022 and finished it in March.
